title: [Ceiluir Glade, Small Park]
description: Pale pink and white petals lightly rain upon the cobblestone pathway from the ancient limbs of a dogwood tree that rises from one corner of the garden.  A raised platform, polished to glitter brightly in the golden sunlight, spreads from flowerbed to flowerbed to create a charming outdoor dancing space, while sea glass charms strung from skeins of silk dangle beside dormant lanterns above.

Pale pink and white petals lightly rain upon the cobblestone pathway from the ancient limbs of a dogwood tree that rises from one corner of the garden.  A raised platform, polished to glitter brightly in the silvery moonlight, spreads from flowerbed to flowerbed to create a charming outdoor dancing space, while illuminated paper lanterns, strung from skeins of silk between sea glass charms, dangle above.
